TITLE: Writing Skills
DEF: Principles for effective and engaging written communication
TASK: The Writing Skills pattern seeks to improve students' ability to effectively communicate through written language. By addressing common issues such as poor organization, grammatical errors, and lack of clarity, learners can refine their writing skills through practice, feedback, and resources like writing centers or online tools. It is essential to foster a supportive and constructive feedback environment to motivate learners and help them view writing as a process of continuous improvement.
